p: We obtained significant results for the R2 (-2.3781), D (-2.3781), and Fs (-4.572) parameters for the P. guyannensis cluster G1. When we analyzed the whole dataset, however, no significant values were obtained, although a significant R2 value was obtained for cluster G4 ( Table 4). We obtained similar results when we analyzed the data organized by interfluve, with significant values being recorded for all the parameters for the Oiapoque-Maroni interfluve (Fs = -4.168; D = -2.3200; R2 = -0.0617), which has haplotypes similar to the G1 cluster.
